name: UntilGraur
description:
You are one of the last dinosaurs on planet earth, your objective is to survive the constant waves of attacks at night. You can plant, build and transform the world around you! You as a dinosaur can crush your enemies with your claws, but sometimes support is needed. Build towers, barricades and put thorns on the ground. Watch the scene, sometimes events arise.
CONTROLS:
You can use AWSD to Move, or arrow keys.
E - Slash enemys and pick items

F- Farm 

Q- Drop Items

I- Crafting Menu
